title: Tomb Cover, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: lampas, 4&1 satin patterned by plain weave
inscribed:
(translated) "may God be pleased with Abu Bakr and Umar and Uthman and Ali and with all the other companions (of the Prophet)"
"God there is noe but he - Muhammad"
"Oh God, bless and give peace to their nobilities all the prophets and missionaries"
"Blessing and peace upon you, the prophet of God'
description: Zig-zag bands with Kufic writomg in green and white. Both selvages present.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tomb Cover, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: lampas, 4&1 satin patterned by plain weave. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-835.
